definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])

sentences.english: A lot of American movies have been dubbed into Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 很多美國電影都被譯製成了中文。

sentences.english: The ruin of an ancient city, please do not climb!
sentences.chinese: 在蘇公塔景區，“古城遺蹟，請勿爬”被譯爲。

sentences.english: Sera Khandro's autobiography is in the process of being translated into English.
sentences.chinese: 色拉康卓的自傳正被譯爲英語。
